application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: SPECIES	WORK PROPOSED	COSTFront gardenT1 Horse Chestnut x 1 (Aesculus hippocastanum) To improve access and light.			Suggested works:	- Thin crown by 20% - Lift all round by approx. 1mRear garden (council owned)T2	Copper Beech x 1	This tree is blocking light from several gardens and properties. To improve light and slow root expansion.	Suggested works:	- Selectively prune all round by approx. 2-3m Thin crown by 20%Rear garden (council owned)T3	Magnolia x 1 (Magnolia spp) This tree is blocking light from several gardens and properties. To improve light 	and slow root expansion.	Suggested works:	- Selectively prune all round by approx. 2-3m make sure that there is 2m clearance from properties. Thin crown by 20%             Over hanging petrol station (council owned)T4	Holm Oak 	(Evergreen) x 1 (Quercus ilex) To lessen weight on this leaning tree.		Suggested works:	- Reduce all round by approx. 3-4m to suitable new growth points. To carry out works to T2-T4 we will need the owner's              permission also to carry out 	  works to T4 we will need permission to work from the petrol station.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
